lemma measure_decr: assumes SV: "s\<in>V" assumes SP: "isShortestPath s p t" assumes SP_EDGES: "edges\<subseteq>set p" assumes Ebounds: "Graph.E c' \<supseteq> E - edges \<union> prod.swap`edges" "Graph.E c' \<subseteq> E \<union> prod.swap`edges" shows "ek_analysis_defs.ekMeasure c' s t \<le> ekMeasure" and "edges - Graph.E c' \<noteq> {} \<Longrightarrow> ek_analysis_defs.ekMeasure c' s t < ekMeasure"
